Version 2.0.96 - Fix iSpring Modern Navigation + Suspend Data Parsing for Rise 360/iSpring Base64

Bug Fixes

  • Fix iSpring LZ-String resume navigation: add iSpring.LMS.instance() discovery chain to navigateViaISpring (mirrors getISpringCurrentSlide detection) so post-load correction actually navigates content to furthest slide
  • Fix Rise 360 suspend_data parsing: add bookmark field support to extractSlideFromParsedData and plain JSON modification to modifySuspendDataForSlide
  • Fix iSpring Base64 suspend_data modification: add Base64-encoded JSON decode/modify/re-encode path in modifySuspendDataForSlide

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.95: Fix refresh resume for all vendors via LMSInitialize wrapper + iSpring post-load navigation
  • v2.0.94: Fix suspend_data corruption + resume format for iSpring/Rise 360
  • v2.0.93: Fix iSpring LZ-String position tracking + persist location format for resume
  • v2.0.92: Fix resume format for iSpring/Rise 360 + Storyline retry backing store correction
